sourcesContent:
import Countdown from "react-countdown"; import styles from "./Categories.module.css"; import { useCountdown } from "../../hooks/useCountdown"; export default function Categories() { const CountdownTimer = ({ targetDate = 24*60*60 }) => { const [days, hours, minutes, seconds] = useCountdown(targetDate); if (days + hours + minutes + seconds <= 0) { return "Promotion is expired"; }else { // Render a countdown return (<>
{days}

Days

{hours}

Hours

{minutes}

Minutes

{seconds}

Seconds

) } } return (

Clothings Hot
Shoe Collection
Accessories

Sale Of
$29.99
Deal Of The Week

Multi-pocket Chest Bag Black

Shop now
); }
